product_name: REI Nylon Duffel Bag - Large - Special Buy
long_description: The large REI Nylon Duffel Bag offers 4,600 cu. in. of space and comes in a convenient storage pouch for simple storage and transport when not in use. 420-denier ripstop nylon is lightweight and tough; dual zippers facilitate easy access into main compartment. Wrap-around 2 in. nylon webbing handles support the load. Tote duffel bag comfortably with the included adjustable shoulder strap. The large REI Nylon Duffel Bag has a convenient storage sack that doubles as a toiletry bag. Special buy.
short_description: The large REI Nylon Duffel Bag offers 4,600 cu. in. of space and comes in a convenient storage pouch for simple storage and transport when not in use.
